COMPONENT.description: Category of metadata (e.g. Diagnosis, Biospecimen, scRNA-seq Level 1, etc.); provide the same one for all items/rows. (No CRDC Standard Available)

HTAN_PARTICIPANT_ID.description: HTAN Identifier of the research participant (caDSR:HTAN-Specific) (No CRDC Standard Available)

ETHNIC_GROUP.description: Ethnic group of the participant (caDSR:2192201) (Aligns to CDRC Standard CDE)

GENDER_IDENTITY.description: Gender identity of the participant (caDSR:2192202) (Aligns to CDRC Standard CDE)

RACE.description: Race of the participant (caDSR:2192204) (Aligns to CDRC Standard CDE)

SEX.description: Sex of the participant (caDSR:2192203) (Aligns to CDRC Standard CDE)

AGE_IN_DAYS_AT_DIAGNOSIS.description: Age in days at which the diagnosis was made (caDSR:2192202) (Aligns to CDRC Standard CDE)

AGE_IN_DAYS_AT_LAST_KNOWN_DISEASE_STATUS.description: Age in days at which the last known disease status was recorded (caDSR:2192203) (Aligns to CDRC Standard CDE)

AJCC_STAGING_SYSTEM_EDITION.description: Required when TUMOR_STAGE is any stage value

CLINICAL_M_STAGE.description: Required when TUMOR_STAGE is any stage value

CLINICAL_T_STAGE.description: Required when TUMOR_STAGE is any stage value

LAST_KNOWN_DISEASE_STATUS.description: Last known disease status (caDSR:2192210) (Aligns to CDRC Standard CDE)

METASTASIS_AT_DIAGNOSIS.description: Required when TUMOR_STAGE is Stage IV or any of its substages

METHOD_OF_DIAGNOSIS.description: Method used to make the diagnosis (caDSR:2192213) (Aligns to CDRC Standard CDE)

PRIMARY_DIAGNOSIS_NCI_THESAURUS_ID.description: NCI Thesaurus ID for the primary diagnosis (caDSR:2192201) (Aligns to CDRC Standard CDE)

TISSUE_OR_ORGAN_OF_ORIGIN_UBERON_CODE.description: UBERON code for the tissue or organ of origin (caDSR:2192205) (Aligns to CDRC Standard CDE)

TUMOR_CLASSIFICATION_CATEGORY.description: Classification category of the tumor (caDSR:2192211) (Aligns to CDRC Standard CDE)

TUMOR_GRADE.description: The grade of the tumor (caDSR:2192203) (Aligns to CDRC Standard CDE)

ALCOHOL_HISTORY_INDICATOR.description: Alcohol history indicator of the participant (caDSR:2192204) (Aligns to CDRC Standard CDE)

ENVIRONMENTAL_EXPOSURE.description: Environmental exposure of the participant (caDSR:2192205) (Aligns to CDRC Standard CDE)

PACK_YEARS_SMOKED.description: Required when SMOKING_HISTORY is Current smoker or Former smoker

SMOKING_HISTORY.description: Smoking history of the participant (caDSR:2192201) (Aligns to CDRC Standard CDE)

YEARS_SMOKED.description: Required when SMOKING_HISTORY is Current smoker or Former smoker

FamilyHistory.description: A class to capture information about the cancer history of family members.

RELATIVES_WITH_CANCER_HISTORY.description: Number of first degree relatives with cancer history

FamilyHistory.title: FamilyHistory

PROGRESSION_OR_RECURRENCE.description: Indicates whether the disease has progressed or recurred

AA_CHANGE.description: Required when MOLECULAR_ANALYSIS_RESULT is Pathogenic variant detected or Variant of uncertain significance detected

AGE_IN_DAYS_AT_MOLECULAR_TEST_START.description: Age in days at molecular test start (caDSR:2192202) (Aligns to CDRC Standard CDE)

AGE_IN_DAYS_AT_MOLECULAR_TEST_STOP.description: Required when MOLECULAR_ANALYSIS_METHOD is DNA Sequencing or RNA Sequencing

CLINICAL_BIOSPECIMEN_TYPE.description: Clinical biospecimen type (caDSR:2192208) (Aligns to CDRC Standard CDE)

COPY_NUMBER.description: Required when MOLECULAR_ANALYSIS_RESULT is Copy number variant detected

EXON.description: Required when MOLECULAR_ANALYSIS_RESULT is Pathogenic variant detected or Variant of uncertain significance detected

GENE_SYMBOL.description: Gene symbol (caDSR:2192204) (Aligns to CDRC Standard CDE)

MOLECULAR_ANALYSIS_METHOD.description: Molecular analysis method (caDSR:2192205) (Aligns to CDRC Standard CDE)

MOLECULAR_ANALYSIS_RESULT.description: Molecular analysis result (caDSR:2192206) (Aligns to CDRC Standard CDE)

MOLECULAR_CONSEQUENCE.description: Required when MOLECULAR_ANALYSIS_RESULT is Pathogenic variant detected or Variant of uncertain significance detected

PATHOGENICITY.description: Required when MOLECULAR_ANALYSIS_RESULT is Pathogenic variant detected or Variant of uncertain significance detected

TEST_ANALYTE_TYPE.description: Required when MOLECULAR_ANALYSIS_METHOD is DNA Sequencing or RNA Sequencing

TEST_RESULT.description: Test result (caDSR:2192215) (Aligns to CDRC Standard CDE)

TEST_UNITS.description: Required when MOLECULAR_ANALYSIS_RESULT is Copy number variant detected

VARIANT_ORIGIN.description: Variant origin (caDSR:2192216) (Aligns to CDRC Standard CDE)

VARIANT_TYPE.description: Variant type (caDSR:2192217) (Aligns to CDRC Standard CDE)

enum: Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander

INITIAL_DISEASE_STATUS.description: Status of the individual's malignancy when the treatment began

PHARMACOTHERAPY_TYPE.description: Whether single or combination pharmacotherapy was used

THERAPEUTIC_AGENTS.description: The NCit Preferred Name(s) of the Therapeutic agent(s)

THERAPY_ANATOMIC_SITE_UBERON_CODE.description: Required when TREATMENT_TYPE is a surgical or radiation therapy
